id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t0.0
text: Coming.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2.0
text: I guess you know we're the amygdalaids and we play music about mind and brain and mental disorders.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t8.0
text: So it's fitting that we're in this particular place tonight.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t12.0
text: And the program is we're going to play a few songs and play about 45 minutes, 50 minutes or so.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t20.0
text: But before each sort of suite of songs, which would be one or two songs together on a particular topic,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t27.0
text: I'll just give you a brief kind of background about the intellectual background of the topic,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t33.0
text: the historical kind of place that the ideas come from, that the song is sort of based upon.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t43.0
text: And we're going to start off with a couple of songs about one of the deep problems in psychology, philosophy,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t52.0
text: neuroscience, psychiatry, all of the things that we know and care about, which is the mind-body problem.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t58.0
text: And you know this goes back to the ancient Greeks.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t63.0
text: We have ideas from the article at Delphi, for example, that the article said know thyself and a couple of millennia later,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t74.0
text: Descartes tried to solve this problem by concluding that the only thing he could know was himself with certainty.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t82.0
text: But you know this becomes, with Freud this becomes more questionable because then we have some issues about how much of what we are is conscious and how much is unconscious.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t94.0
text: So a couple of themes will be explored tonight through the music is consciousness and unconsciousness and the automaticity of certain aspects of who we are.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t103.0
text: And we're going to start with a couple of songs that are more in the area of consciousness,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t109.0
text: in particular with the first one is sort of a tribute to Descartes and he goes like this.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t133.0
text: I think so I am, I feel so I must be, sometimes I don't know, but it is to be me, I see your eyes,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t152.0
text: and they're staring at me, they're sharp as knives, oh what do we see, you can't see, you can't see inside of me,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t169.0
text: inside of me there's a blade only I can be.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t194.0
text: My soul has passion, it's trying to feel, searching for desire, nothing is real, my will is weak, it's not very free,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t216.0
text: nothing to get hung about, oh that's just the deal, you can't see inside of me, inside of me, that's a place only I can be,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t239.0
text: you can't see inside of me, inside of me that's a place only I can be.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t269.0
text: I think so I am, I feel so I must be, sometimes I don't know, it's to be me,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t298.0
text: I think so I am, I feel so I must be, sometimes I don't know, but it is to be me, you can't see, you can't see inside of me,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t321.0
text: inside of me that's a place only I can be.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t336.0
text: All right, thank you very much.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t355.36
text: Tyler, you'd say something for a minute while I switch guitars.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t361.84
text: Well, about the mind-body problem.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t364.96
text: Yes, what's the next song, Joe?

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t366.84
text: I forgot.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t367.84
text: Mind-over-matter.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t368.84
text: Oh, mind-over-matter.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t369.84
text: So, yeah, yeah, we have to, well, of course, in culture, we think we have a lot of control

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t379.71999999999997
text: over matter, and we do in a certain sort of way.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t383.44
text: But there's always a longing for more and more transcendence.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t389.56
text: We think of ourselves as immaterial beings as the same times that we're materially embodied

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t394.92
text: and so this next song is a little bit about the, that kind of conflict between the material

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t401.48
text: and the immaterial.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t402.96000000000004
text: Yeah, and it's about the, you know, the longing that you can have for someone who's not here

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t411.44
text: and sort of delude yourself into thinking you can overcome space and time and bring

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t417.16
text: that person together with you.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t433.08
text: Mind-over-matter.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t448.64
text: If I write down space and time.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t466.12
text: Mind over matter

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t470.12
text: Something I'm trying to do

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t474.12

text: Now we're going to switch gears to

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t667.12
text: The unconscious mind

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t670.12
text: We're going to do a couple of songs

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t673.12
text: About how we aren't always quite aware of what's driving our behavior

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t678.12
text: Deep below the surface

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t683.12
text: This is a song by Tyler

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t687.12
text: And I want you to tell us a bit about it

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t690.12
text: This song is about the way the mind travels by itself

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t695.12
text: On its own journey

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t697.12
text: You can not have any

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t700.12
text: Stimulus

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t703.12
text: I think I'm thinking

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t708.12
text: But thinking is thinking me

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t713.12
text: This is an ongoing meditation for me

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t718.12
text: The song is called

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t721.12
text: The automatic mind

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t724.12
text: Right now it's the automatic mind

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t728.12
text: It's got an interesting

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t731.12
text: Bass part here

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t761.12
text: Welcome to the automatic mind

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t782.12
text: The door is open to remembered time

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t791.12

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t798.12
text: Guiding actions on the waking screen

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t805.12
text: Even though I realize it's still I feel so blind

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t816.12
text: As I think about

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t820.12
text: And can't live without the automatic mind

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t840.12

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t854.12
text: Introspection opens in her eyes

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t861.12
text: It seems advanced yet hardly in control

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t868.12
text: Illusion of the will is comfort cold

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t875.12
text: Even though I realize it's still I feel so blind

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t887.12
text: As I think about

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t890.12
text: And can't live without the automatic mind

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t896.12
text: Walk, talk, blank, drink, think

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t903.12
text: You think, you think, you think

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t913.12
text: You think, you think, you think, you think

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t917.12
text: Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t977.12
text: Even though I realize it's still I feel so blind as I think about and can't live without

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t992.12
text: automatic mind.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t996.12
text: Tyler, well, all right, so let me just take that opportunity to introduce Tyler Tyler

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1004.12
text: and I'm a professor of environmental sciences and biology at NYU and he works on atmospheric

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1011.12
text: issues and carbon and things like that, anything else you want to add about that?

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1015.12
text: That sounds good, Joe.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1017.12
text: Okay, and Daniela Schiller is an assistant professor at Mount Sinai.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1022.12
text: She's a cognitive neuroscientist and she studies recovery from fear and processes in the brain

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1029.12
text: that allow people to get over fears through various ways, anything else?

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1035.12
text: Yeah, no, that's very good.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1037.12
text: And she's also an award-winning storyteller for the Moth organization and other places.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1044.12
text: Amanda Thorpe is a world-famous international musician.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1054.12
text: She hails from Derby, England, Darby, I guess it's a doggy.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1061.12
text: All right, and we're very fortunate to have her with us.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1066.12
text: Although she's not technically a scientist, she does have a background in neuropsychology

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1071.12
text: from University College London, so we count her as a part of the team.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1076.12
text: It's not a kid.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1077.12
text: It's not a kid, it's not a kid, it's a kid.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1078.12
text: But she's a fabulous musician with a separate solo career altogether with a bunch of CDs.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1083.12
text: You can find her online at demandathorp.com, right?

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1087.12
text: Okay.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1088.12
text: Okay, I'm Joel Adou and I'm a professor of neuroscience at NYU.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1093.12
text: And now we're going to do a song called, what are we doing?

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1096.12
text: My Mind's Eye.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1097.12
text: There we go.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1099.12
text: So, My Mind's Eye is another one about the way the mind plays tricks on us and does things

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1107.12
text: that we don't always know too much about.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1110.12
text: And if I can remember where this thing goes, this time we're being good shit.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1612.12
text: Now we have a song called Trace, which is something that people here have studied,

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1626.12
text: of traces of memories, how they leave permanent records in the neurons and now the DNA and

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1634.12
text: the neurotransmitters from having the memory, it's really there.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1638.12
text: So it's a connection between our daily lives and the discoveries about the neurological

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1644.12
text: systems of our brains.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1646.12

text: She's a good scientist.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t1989.24
text: I saw you leaving. You saw me too. You smiled at me. That's what you do.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2004.24
text: I tried to follow, but you were gone. Now I'm awake, sitting home alone.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2020.24
text: Keep thinking about your smile and eyes. Can't believe your words were lost.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2035.24
text: You made me happy, so very glad. Can't forget those times we had.

text: There must be something in my brain. There must be something in my veins.

text: There must be something in my veins. There must be something in my veins.

text: I didn't know, but you'd be there. And the weak also, it's so hard to realize.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2110.24
text: I wasn't really aware you're at. I dream about you. Most every night.

text: I dream you're there. Everything's alright. I keep hoping. My dreams will come true.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2140.24
text: But I'll wake up right next to you. There must be something in my brain. There must be something in my veins.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2162.24
text: There must be some crime or glue. That keeps my memories stuck on you.

text: I keep thinking about your smile and eyes. Can't believe your words were lost.

text: You made me happy, so very glad. I can't forget those times we had.

text: There must be something in my brain. There must be something in my veins.

text: There must be some crime or glue. That keeps my memories stuck on you.

text: That keeps my memories stuck on you. That keeps my memories stuck on you.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2291.24
text: We've done memory and the mind-body problem, the unconscious, and now we're turning to fear.

text: It's almost 8 o'clock. If anybody wants us to keep playing, raise your hand if you want us to stop.

text: We'll play a couple more songs.

text: When the night is dark, I lose my fear.

text: When the night is dark, never shed a tear. Then the daylight comes, scares me away.

text: The daylight comes, and I have to fake. When the night is dark, I feel so free.

text: When the night is dark, the night is dark. I feel the peace. Then the daylight comes, and scares me away.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2411.24
text: When the daylight comes, it's when I have to fake.

text: When the night is dark,

text: When the daylight comes, daylight comes, when I have to fake. When the daylight comes, scares me away.

text: When the daylight comes, when I have to fake.

text: We're going to close things out here with a song that ends where we started.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2536.24
text: We're going to close things out here with a song that ends where we started.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2565.24
text: I've got a mind-body problem. I don't know what to do. I've got a problem. I don't know what to do.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2590.24
text: My body wants you so. My mind says no. You said you'd always love me. To me it'd be true.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2607.24
text: You said you'd love me. To me it'd be true. Well now you're gone. I'm sad and blue.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2623.24
text: Well now you're back. You want me again. Now you're back. You want me again. If I relent, I lose in the end.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2648.24
text: I've got a mind-body problem. I don't know what to do. I've got a problem. I don't know what to do.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2665.24
text: My body wants you so. My mind says no no no no no no no no no no no.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2691.24
text: I even tried religion. Get over you. I even tried religion. To get over you. My body's not your song.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2717.24
text: Oh, you're back. I've got a problem. I don't know what to do. I can't get over it. I can't get over it.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2736.24
text: Oh, yeah baby. I'm going insane.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2766.24
text: I've got a mind-body problem. I don't know what to do. I've got a problem. I don't know what to do.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2789.24
text: My body wants you so. My mind says no.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2801.24
text: Okay, thank you and good night.

id: UCvShfJtvC2owV0AFi_qyykA/The Amygdaloids Warburg Symposium Concert Friday October 11th-t2809.24
text: Thanks. You've been great. Thanks for coming out here tonight. Enjoy the conference.
